con:testCase.name: PUT /v2/pet/Update
con:testCase.con:description: Updates Pet details: category name, status

con:config.script: def user = 'test' //set username here def pass = 'ak123'// set password here def credentials = [ user, pass ] def authString = 'Basic ' + credentials.join(":").getBytes().encodeBase64().toString() //encode, than set the value as Authorization Header log.info(authString) //log the result
